/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, divided by a median, is flanked by lush green trees on both sides, creating a natural canopy over the urban landscape. 

On the left side of the street, a large billboard stands tall, while on the right side, a building with a red roof adds a splash of color to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds adding depth to the vast expanse. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene and highlighting the vibrant colors of the cityscape. The image beautifully encapsulates the blend of nature and urban life in Beijing.
